channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Chip giant TSMC says their production was back in full swing within three days o
item.description: Chip giant TSMC says their production was back in full swing within three days of April's magnitude 7.2 earthquake in Taiwan's eastern Hualien County.

item.title: Free Therapy for Hualien Earthquake Survivors
item.description: In light of the massive earthquake that struck Hualien at the start of the month, survivors and rescue workers dealing with post traumatic stress are being offered free counseling

item.title: President-Elect Lai Makes Time's Most Influential of 2024
item.description: Taiwan's Vice President and President-elect Lai Ching-te has been named one of Time magazine's 100 Most Influential People of 2024.

item.title: Taiwan’s Cabinet Approves White Terror Remembrance Day
item.description: May 19 has been made an annual memorial day for Taiwan’s White Terror period of political violence.
